title: 182: Herodotus III: Egypt and Water Horses
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Continuing on in the Landmark Herodotus, we get to a chapter which earns him the moniker, "Father of Lies." Overstating it a bit, don't you think?
itunes:author: I dunno, a machine made out of small sticks I guess.
itunes:subtitle: Tusks! Tusks for everyone!
itunes:summary: Continuing on in the Landmark Herodotus, we get to a chapter which earns him the moniker, "Father of Lies." Overstating it a bit, don't you think?
